amendment.description: To require a plan for the continuity of the economy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2275 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2275 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184) To require a plan for the continuity of the economy.
